title: 16 Cute & Romantic Birthday Wishes for Your Boyfriend

steps.title: "No wonder I always fall asleep in your arms."
steps.content: "No wonder I always fall asleep in your arms." This message will warm his heart and remind him of the time you've spent together.

steps.title: "Can't wait to kiss you before midnight."
steps.content: "Can't wait to kiss you before midnight." Show him that he's your knight in shining armor. Everyone loves a fairytale! [1] X Research source

steps.title: "After all, I get to be with you!"
steps.content: "After all, I get to be with you!" Use this to show him how much you care, and how happy you are to share this special occasion together.

steps.title: "...and many more memories to share."
steps.content: "...and many more memories to share." Drop him a hint that you think your relationship has long-term potential.

steps.title: "Guess I'm rubbing off on you, huh?"
steps.content: "Guess I'm rubbing off on you, huh?" He's lucky to have you, and he knows it. Might as well remind him! [2] X Research source

steps.title: "You're on fire, birthday boy!"
steps.content: "You're on fire, birthday boy!" Make him feel sexy and appreciated. Who doesn't like to feel hot in their birthday?

steps.title: "I bet you ask yourself that every day!"
steps.content: "I bet you ask yourself that every day!" Funny and unexpected: the perfect combination for a guy with a sense of humor.

steps.title: "He must be dating someone pretty hot!"
steps.content: "He must be dating someone pretty hot!" Flatter him and make him laugh. You aren't wrong, after all.

steps.title: "I can't wait to drink you up!"
steps.content: "I can't wait to drink you up!" Being goofy and being flirty go together perfectly, just like the two of you.

steps.title: "...but your birthday present sure isn't!"
steps.content: "...but your birthday present sure isn't!" He'll know what you mean.

steps.title: "You'll have to unwrap me later!"
steps.content: "You'll have to unwrap me later!" Let him know that he has more to look forward to than just a card. [3] X Research source

steps.title: "...but they're too naughty to put here."
steps.content: "...but they're too naughty to put here." For extra laughs, have him open this one in front of people. Bonus points if he reads it out loud.

steps.title: "Here's to you babe!"
steps.content: "Here's to you babe!" Simple and romantic. Sometimes that's all you need.

steps.title: "Happy birthday to my shooting star!"
steps.content: "Happy birthday to my shooting star!" If your boyfriend is the romantic type, he'll gush over this one.

steps.title: "Love, your better half."
steps.content: "Love, your better half." It's no secret: you make each other whole. [4] X Research source

steps.title: "Happy birthday my love!"
steps.content: "Happy birthday my love!" Make him feel loved and appreciated. What more could a guy want?
